parts.name: SnowBot V1 Platform Root
parts.description: Platform record for the SnowBot V1 system.
parts.notes: Root SKU for platform tracking.

parts.name: Chassis Subsystem
parts.description: Welded frame + armor, open steel structure, no cockpit.
parts.notes: Armor is bolt-on. Sacrificial wear parts are separate.

parts.name: Main Frame Weldment Assembly
parts.description: Primary welded structure supporting drivetrain and snow module.
parts.notes: Revision B improved gusseting and service access.

parts.name: Frame Weldment (Powder Coat)
parts.description: Welded steel frame with corrosion-resistant coating.
parts.notes: Critical structural part; coating spec controlled.

parts.name: Armor Panels Set (Bolt-on)
parts.description: Replaceable armor plates; non-glass, integrated low profile.
parts.notes: Designed for quick replacement in field.

parts.name: Service Hatch & Latches
parts.description: Access hatch hardware for maintenance; glove-friendly.
parts.notes: Alt SKU is compatible latch set.

parts.name: Structural Fastener Kit
parts.description: Standardized fasteners for armor and service panels.
parts.notes: Kit is controlled to reduce BOM noise.

parts.name: Drive Subsystem (Tracked)
parts.description: Tracked drivetrain; low CG; no human stabilization required.
parts.notes: Traction must hold on icy grades without slip.

parts.name: Left Track Drive Module
parts.description: Left-side motor + gearbox + mounting interface.
parts.notes: Thermal derating reviewed for heavy snow loads.

parts.name: Traction Motor + Gearbox (Left)
parts.description: High-torque electric drive unit; sealed connectors.
parts.notes: Alt requires ECO due to mounting bolt pattern.

parts.name: Track & Sprocket Set (Left)
parts.description: Thick rubber track and sprocket for left side.
parts.notes: Wear part; tread spec locked.

parts.name: Right Track Drive Module
parts.description: Right-side motor + gearbox + mounting interface.
parts.notes: Mirrors left module; controlled separately for traceability.

parts.name: Traction Motor + Gearbox (Right)
parts.description: High-torque electric drive unit; sealed connectors.
parts.notes: Alt requires ECO due to connector pinout.

parts.name: Track & Sprocket Set (Right)
parts.description: Thick rubber track and sprocket for right side.
parts.notes: Wear part; spare track recommended.

parts.name: Track Tensioner Kit (L/R)
parts.description: Adjustable tensioner; prevents derailment in wet snow.
parts.notes: Needs torque spec + lock feature.

parts.name: Snow Intake Subsystem (Two-stage)
parts.description: Must include push + auger + cutting edge; feeds impeller.
parts.notes: Snow flow direction: front → mid → up.

parts.name: Intake Housing Assembly
parts.description: Front intake shell + auger supports + motor mount.
parts.notes: Revision B improved anti-clog geometry.

parts.name: Front Intake Shell (Welded/Formed)
parts.description: Primary snow capture shell; weldment + formed surfaces.
parts.notes: Coating + abrasion lining under review.

parts.name: Auger Shaft Assembly
parts.description: Auger shaft with keyed interfaces and seals.
parts.notes: Alt differs in bearing seat length.

parts.name: Auger Bearing Block (L/R)
parts.description: Sealed bearing blocks for auger support.
parts.notes: Grease access required; snow ingress protected.

parts.name: Auger Drive Motor
parts.description: High-torque electric motor driving auger; sealed connectors.
parts.notes: Torque margin validated for wet snow.

parts.name: Shear Bolt / Pin Kit (Sacrificial)
parts.description: Shear protection consumables for auger driveline.
parts.notes: Field replaceable; keep spares in service kit.

parts.name: Discharge Subsystem (Impeller + Chute)
parts.description: Impeller must align with snowflow; chute base fixed on top housing; rotate only.
parts.notes: No drifting chute. No external mast.

parts.name: Impeller Housing Assembly
parts.description: Impeller chamber assembly with bearing supports and motor mount.
parts.notes: Revision B increased clearance for slush.

parts.name: Impeller Rotor (Balanced)
parts.description: Balanced impeller rotor; abrasion resistant material.
parts.notes: Balance spec is critical for bearing life.

parts.name: Impeller Drive Motor
parts.description: Electric motor driving impeller; sealed connectors.
parts.notes: Thermal testing ongoing.

parts.name: Impeller Bearing Set
parts.description: Sealed bearings for impeller shaft.
parts.notes: Grease vs sealed selection under evaluation.

parts.name: Discharge Chute Assembly
parts.description: Chute with fixed base collar and rotating head. No drift, no external bracket.
parts.notes: Rotation axis locked to housing geometry.

parts.name: Chute Base Collar (Fixed)
parts.description: Fixed base collar mounted on top housing; supports chute rotation.
parts.notes: Critical alignment feature for snowflow.

parts.name: Chute Rotation Actuator
parts.description: Actuator for left-right chute rotation; sealed; low profile.
parts.notes: PWM control interface.

parts.name: Chute Ring Bearing
parts.description: Ring bearing allowing chute rotation with snow/ice tolerance.
parts.notes: Icing behavior test planned.

parts.name: Power Subsystem (Battery + HV Distribution)
parts.description: Fully electric powertrain. Battery pack + HV protection + DC/DC.
parts.notes: No diesel. Serviceability prioritized.

parts.name: Battery Pack Assembly
parts.description: Sealed pack with serviceable internal modules and BMS.
parts.notes: Thermal design margin tracked.

parts.name: Battery Module Set (Internal)
parts.description: Internal energy modules (chemistry + form factor controlled).
parts.notes: Alt requires electrical + thermal revalidation.

parts.name: BMS + Contactors
parts.description: BMS controller, contactors, precharge, and safety interfaces.
parts.notes: Safety signals integrated with compute safety IO.

parts.name: HV Distribution / Fuse Block
parts.description: HV fusing and distribution panel. Sealed enclosure.
parts.notes: Creepage/clearance controlled.

parts.name: DC/DC Converter (HV to 24V)
parts.description: Converts HV bus to 24V for sensors/compute/lighting.
parts.notes: EMI performance must be verified.

parts.name: HV Harness Labels + Seals Kit
parts.description: Harness labeling and environmental seals kit.
parts.notes: Supports auditability and service.

parts.name: Sensors Subsystem (No Mast)
parts.description: Integrated low-profile sensor suite. No pole/mast.
parts.notes: Armor housing is non-glass, integrated.

parts.name: Industrial LiDAR (Ruggedized)
parts.description: Industrial LiDAR, low-profile mount, snow-rated enclosure.
parts.notes: Revision B changed window heating strategy.

parts.name: Industrial Cameras (Front/Side)
parts.description: Rugged cameras with heated lens cover option. Integrated mount.
parts.notes: No glass canopy; local lens protection only.

parts.name: IMU + Temperature Sensing
parts.description: IMU for motion + tilt; temperature probes for safety logic.
parts.notes: Mount inside sensor armor.

parts.name: Sensor Armor Housing (Integrated)
parts.description: Armored enclosure, low-profile, non-glass, structurally integrated.
parts.notes: Designed to survive impact and vibration.

parts.name: Lighting Subsystem (Industrial Safety)
parts.description: Safety lighting: top beacon, front work lights, rear amber, side markers. No decorative lighting.
parts.notes: All lights sealed, shock-rated.

parts.name: Top Strobe Beacon (Low Profile)
parts.description: Low, wide-base cylindrical beacon integrated into armor. No pole.
parts.notes: Must remain visible in snowfall.

parts.name: Front Work Lights (High Intensity)
parts.description: White work lights designed to penetrate snow; sealed housing.
parts.notes: Beam pattern validated with snow plume.

parts.name: Rear Amber Warning Lights
parts.description: Rear amber warning lights; wide angle visibility.
parts.notes: Flashing pattern controlled by safety IO.

parts.name: Side Marker ID Lights (Embedded)
parts.description: Side marker lamps; embedded into armor; sealed.
parts.notes: Used for perimeter awareness.

parts.name: Compute Subsystem (Onboard)
parts.description: Onboard compute + safety IO + sealed harnessing.
parts.notes: Engineering UI favors stability over flashy features.

parts.name: Main Compute Unit (Industrial)
parts.description: Industrial compute unit suitable for perception and autonomy stack.
parts.notes: Revision B increased thermal headroom.

parts.name: Safety IO Controller
parts.description: Safety loop monitoring (E-stop), lights control, fault latching.
parts.notes: No human controls; remote E-stop interfaces only.

parts.name: Sealed Wiring Harness Set
parts.description: Sealed connectors; labeled harness for auditability.
parts.notes: Routing must avoid snow ingestion zones.

parts.name: GNSS/RTK Receiver (Low Profile)
parts.description: Positioning module for structured environments; low-profile mount.
parts.notes: Mount integrated; no mast/pole.

parts.name: Charging Subsystem (Wireless Dock)
parts.description: Rear-facing vertical wireless charging. Dock must survive snow burial risk.
parts.notes: Design targets unattended use during storms.

parts.name: Wireless Charging Receiver Module
parts.description: Receiver module integrated on rear face; sealed; alignment tolerant.
parts.notes: Revision B improved alignment tolerance.

parts.name: Dock Alignment Guide / Bumper
parts.description: Mechanical guide for rear docking; snow tolerant geometry.
parts.notes: Replaceable wear bumper recommended.

parts.name: Charge Control Interface Board
parts.description: Charging control interface, fault monitoring, comms to compute.
parts.notes: EMI and thermal review pending.

parts.name: Cutting Edge (Bolt-on, Sacrificial)
parts.description: Ground-contact cutting edge. Must be replaceable metal wear part.
parts.notes: Wear item. Field replacement is mandatory.

parts.name: Skid Shoes (Wear Item)
parts.description: Skid shoes for surface protection and height control.
parts.notes: Consumable wear part.

parts.name: Service Consumables Kit (Grease + Misc)
parts.description: Standard service kit items for field maintenance.
parts.notes: Keeps service procedures consistent.
